Description: Limestone ostracon containing the story of the woman taken in adultery, written in Coptic. John 8.9-11.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.27, pl.20)
von Lemm 1910 / Koptische Miscellen LXVIII-LXXII (p.69-71, no.9)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (111700) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/111700)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 20:2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
